item.description:
Last Year we saw a play at Edgerton Park and had a great time. The play starts at 8:00 PM but we should get there early to make sure that we reserve a good spot.

Location: Edgerton Park
75 Cliff St.
New Haven, CT 06520
Date(s): August 19-22, 24-29, 31-Sept. 5, 2010
Time(s): 8 p.m.
Category: Performing Art
Description: The Elm Shakespeare Company presents William Shakespeare's "The Winter Tale.

Admission: Free with suggested donations: adults $20, students $10, children (12 and under) $5..

Phone: (203) 393-1436
URL: http://www.elmshakesp...


http://www.elmshakesp...
item.how_to_find_us: look for the black and white scarf with piano keys on a tall pole
item.name: William Shakespeare's- THE WINTER'S TALE
